page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: Most Christian denominations are represented in Hucknall. The town covers three{C of E}parishes each with their own vicar. The{Roman Catholic Church has one worship centre on Watnall Road.{Non-Conormist}tradition in Hucknall is very strong although many smaller chapels have been closed and amalgamated to form larger worshipping units.The{Baptist Church is flourishing with two worship centres.{Methodist}congregations hve declined although there is a new church centre. Other groups in the town include the{Salvation Army, the {Pentecostal}Church,the{United Reform {Church}and the{Assemblies of God. Results from a questionnaire revealed that although large numbers of people are C of E, only a small percentage worship on a regular basis.
